summary: Flutter app for Brother's Live Cartoon - a cartoon character booking service with business information display and contact functionality (call and WhatsApp)
architectural_notes: Flutter mobile app using Material Design
url_launcher package for phone calls and WhatsApp integration
Single-page layout with business information display
Contact methods: direct phone call and WhatsApp booking link
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Colorful cartoon gorilla character mascot in costume, friendly and energetic pose (gorilla.dim_400x400.png)
- Cute red teddy bear character mascot in costume, welcoming pose (red-teddy.dim_400x400.png)
- Cheerful yellow teddy bear character mascot in costume, playful pose (yellow-teddy.dim_400x400.png)
- Doraemon character mascot, iconic blue cat robot with friendly expression (doraemon.dim_400x400.png)
- Mickey Mouse character mascot in classic pose with welcoming gesture (mickey-mouse.dim_400x400.png)
- Motu-Patlu character duo mascots, both characters together in friendly pose (motu-patlu.dim_400x400.png)
- Vibrant birthday party scene with cartoon characters and children celebrating, colorful balloons and decorations (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a landing page displaying business information for Brother's Live Cartoon including: company name 'BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON', tagline 'Live Cartoon Characters', address 'Raval Chakala, Jaghnath Bhaghol, Umreth - 388220, Dist - Anand', contact phone number '9427065911', list of available characters (Gorilla, Red Teddy, Yellow Teddy, Doraemon, Mickey Mouse, Motu-Patlu), event types supported (Birthday Party, Wedding Entry and other Events), and service highlights (High Quality Costumes, Energetic Performers, Reasonable Rates)
Implement a 'Call Now' button that opens the phone dialer with the phone number 9427065911 prefilled when clicked
Implement a 'Book on WhatsApp' button that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message 'Hello BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON, I want to book a cartoon character.' addressed to phone number 919427065911

Apply a vibrant, playful visual theme suitable for a children's entertainment service with warm, inviting colors (orange accent color as primary brand color), rounded friendly shapes, and engaging typography that conveys fun and professionalism
Render generated character images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated and display them in the character showcase section
